body_html: Normally I think we would allocate the memory on all detected devices. Could you check the initial message to see if they are detected and used? You can use with tf.device('/gpu:1) to manually place.
body_text: Normally I think we would allocate the memory on all detected devices. Could you check the initial message to see if they are detected and used? You can use with tf.device('/gpu:1) to manually place.
body: Normally I think we would allocate the memory on all detected devices. Could you check the initial message to see if they are detected and used? You can use `with tf.device('/gpu:1)` to manually place.
